Text: Avast! didn't flag this crack and it allows at least auto-saving to function.  As such I believe that an "It works" is in order, at least until someone finds a horrible bug like, IIRC, the one in Dead Space 2 from Fairlight's earlier crack that prevented game progression.
why the heck does this game need a crack?? it has no copy protection. you just need to use an offline account to save.
this one works with SAVE ENABLED!!!!
